text:
Britain’s medicine regulator said anyone with a history of #anaphylaxis to a medicine or food should not get the #PfizerBioNTech #COVID19 #vaccine, giving fuller guidance on an earlier allergy warning about the shot https://t.co/21o6a42nr7

#PfizerCovidVaccine #FDA @MHRAgovuk https://t.co/kFhuSn3VIR
